ISSUE.TITLE: Small but critical bug for configuration on 0.9.1-post1 release.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** After install recent release and initialize the project folder, when you contact setting menu to customize labeling environment, the bug has occured. **To Reproduce** Steps to reproduce the behavior: 1. pip install label-studio (recent) 2. label-studio start my_project -- init 3. browser opened 4. access into setting page on browser **Expected behavior** Configuration page works well and initial configuration procedure can be completed. **Screenshots** **Environment (please complete the following information):** - OS: Linux 4.15.0-130-generic #134-Ubuntu SMP x86_64 GNU/Linux - Label Studio Version : 0.9.1-post1

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [#642] add encoding type into configuration opener
[#642] add encoding type into configuration opener
[#642] add encoding type into configuration opener (#643) Co-authored-by: hongs.lee <hongsworld@users.noreply.github.com>
